privacyPolicyDesc.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyDesc.subtitle: Welcome to Aran Jannson's Portfolio Website!
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph1: Thank you for visiting Aran Jannson's Portfolio Website. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle information collected from our visitors. Our website is designed to showcase our portfolio and includes links to external websites for further information.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph2: 1. What are Cookies? Cookies are small text files placed on your device to collect standard internet log information and visitor behavior. They help us improve our site and provide a better, more personalized service.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph3: 2. How We Use Cookies: We use cookies to understand how you interact with our site, which helps us enhance your user experience. Cookies may track things like how long you spend on the site and the pages you visit.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph4: 3. Your Choice Regarding Cookies: You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer. Note that disabling cookies may limit your experience on our website.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph5: Our website contains links to external sites. Please be aware that we do not control these other websites, and this Privacy Policy does not apply to them. We encourage you to read the privacy statements of any other site that collects personally identifiable information.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph6: We do not collect personal information from our visitors. Our website is purely informational, and no registration or personal data submission is required.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph7: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. While we do not collect personal information, we take precautions to secure our website and protect it from unauthorized access.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph8: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We encourage visitors to frequently check this page for any changes and to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect.
privacyPolicyDesc.paragraph9: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please do not hesitate to contact us through https://www.aranjannson.com/contact .

homePageDescription: Welcome to Aran Jannson's Portfolio: Dive into a curated selection of my most impactful projects, browse my expertise in various programming languages and frameworks, and get to know more about me. Connect with me through links to my GitHub and LinkedIn for a deeper insight into my professional journey.
contactPageDescription: Looking to connect? Visit the Contact page on my Portfolio Website. Here, you can reach out to me, whether for professional collaborations, project inquiries, or just to say hello. I'm always open to new opportunities and conversations!
privacyPolicyPageDescription: Read my commitment to your privacy on the Website. This Privacy Policy outlines how I handle and protect your information, ensuring transparency and trust in my digital interactions.
projectsPageDescription: Explore a range of my innovative projects showcasing expertise in various technologies and creative solutions. This page highlights my professional journey in software development and design, reflecting my passion for collaboration and technical excellence.
socialsPageDescription: Discover my social media presence on the Socials page of my portfolio. Here, you'll find direct links to connect with me on LinkedIn, GitHub, GitLab, and more. Follow along for my latest updates, professional insights, and interactive engagements across various platforms.
blogPageDescription: Welcome to my Blog! Dive into a world of thoughts, insights, and stories on my Portfolio Website. Here, I share my experiences, knowledge, and ideas on technology, projects, and professional growth. Join the conversation and explore my latest posts.
